mapper.insert: insert into medical_project(project_name, project_price, project_dept_id) value(#{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{projectDeptId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update medical_project
project_name = #{updated.projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project_price = #{updated.projectPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
project_dept_id = #{updated.projectDeptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where project_id=#{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update medical_project set project_is_deleted = 1 where project_id = #{projectId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from medical_project join healthsystem.medical_package_project mpp on medical_project.project_id = mpp.pp_project_id where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from medical_project join healthsystem.medical_package_project mpp on medical_project.project_id = mpp.pp_project_id where mpp.pp_package_id = #{packageId, jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
,
from medical_project join healthsystem.medical_project_item mpi on medical_project.project_id = mpi.pi_project_id join healthsystem.medical_item mi on mpi.pi_item_id = mi.item_id
project_is_deleted = 0
and project_id in
#{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and project_id = -1

select
from medical_project join healthsystem.medical_project_item mpi on medical_project.project_id = mpi.pi_project_id where project_id=#{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
